mapper.select: select o.po_no as o_po_no, o.print_count as o_print_count, o.po_type as o_po_type, o.po_status as o_po_status, o.po_source as o_po_source, o.to_shop_id as o_to_shop_id, o.to_shop_name as o_to_shop_name, o.from_shop_id as o_from_shop_id, o.from_shop_name as o_from_shop_name, o.order_price as o_order_price, o.expected_time as o_expected_time, o.user_define1 as o_user_define1, o_i_address, o.i_contact as o_i_contact, o.i_tel as o_i_tel, o.supplier_id as o_supplier_id , o.supplier_name as o_supplier_name, o.supplier_address as o_supplier_address, o.supplier_contact as o_supplier_contact, o.supplier_tel as o_supplier_tel, o.supplier_zip_code as o_supplier_zip_code, o.volume as o_volume, o.receiving_time as o_receiving_time, o.audit_time as o_audit_time, o.created_name as o_created_name, o.created_time as o_created_time, o.updated_name as o_updated_name, o.updated_time as o_updated_time, o.auditor_id as o_auditor_id, o.auditor as o_auditor, o.relation_no as o_relation_no, o.delivery_time as o_delivery_time, d.po_detail_id as d_po_detail_id, d.po_no as d_po_no, d.line_no as d_line_no, d.category_code as d_category_code, d.category_name as d_category_name, d.bar_code as d_bar_code, d.brand_code as d_brand_code, d.brand_name as d_brand_name , d.goods_name as d_goods_name, d.sku as d_sku, d.parent_sku as d_parent_sku, d.property as d_property , d.line_status as d_line_status, d.lot_num as d_lot_num, d.seq as d_seq, d.sub_qty as d_sub_qty, d.user_define1 as d_user_define1, d.user_define2 as d_user_define2, d.user_define3 as d_user_define3, d.receive_time as d_receive_time, d.receive_qty as d_receive_qty, d.expected_qty as d_expected_qty, d.ordered_qty as d_ordered_qty, d.unit as d_unit, d.convert_qty as d_convert_qty, d.convert_unit as d_convert_unit, d.is_gift as d_is_gift, d.total_price as d_total_price, d.cost_price as d_cost_price, d.price as d_price, d.volume as d_volume, d.rate_precent as d_rate_precent, d.memo as d_memo, d.created_time as d_created_time, d.updated_time as d_updated_time from doc_po_header o left join doc_po_details d on d.po_no = o.po_no where o.po_no = #{poNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select po_no from doc_po_header where po_no like concat(#{poNo},'%') order by po_no desc
